item.title: Glitch?
item.dc:creator: @Global Global
item.description:
@Global wrote:

[quote=“zoss0, post:13, topic:51105”][quote author=Global link=topic=71630.msg815008#msg815008 date=1169651418]


Another?
Also i need help with the shilo village quest.

What you see there is Lag.
This is caused by the sever getting lagspikes and/or your internet connection.
[/quote]
No i don’t think so, i waited there for about 5 secs, i’ve also got 512kb broadband =P[/quote]
It might be possible that the cat is staying with you whilst during the lage spike.
Also things like this are Not Glitches.
Glitches are like loopholes within the game. That you or somone else can use as an advantage.

item.title: Glitch?
item.dc:creator: @Rictoo Rictoo
item.description:
@Rictoo wrote:

Texasmd91, if there is more than one computer connected to the internet through a router, yes it will slow down your internet because the router shares the connection among the the different computers. HOWEVER, the wireless connection has nothing to do with it. The same thing would happen if you connected to the router with an Ethernet cable.

EDIT: So if you connect to the internet through a router with only one computer wirelessly, the internet speed would not be compromised. However, once you begin connecting more and more clients, the internet speed will be affected (the severity of the speed drop depends on your ISP’s package you signed up for).

Read full topic

item.title: Glitch?
item.dc:creator: @Texasmd91 Texasmd91
item.description:
@Texasmd91 wrote:

[quote=“Rictoo, post:8, topic:51105”][quote author=Nazgand~ link=topic=71630.msg814302#msg814302 date=1169631482]
Freaking wireless connection, it sucks…(myn anyway)
[/quote]

GOD I’m tired of people not knowing what a ‘wireless connection’ is.
The only way a wireless connection could be slowing you down is if your internet connection was over 11mbps, which I highly doubt.[/quote]
my wireless internet slows me down also,

we got 6 computer with wireless internet connecting to 1 internet,

umm yes it can

Read full topic
